dc:title: The Final Word Is Love
dc:creator: Dorothy Day

dc:description.P: Poetically expresses the essential charism of the Catholic Worker Movement--poverty, community, and love found in eucharistic companionship. [Note: this text became the Postscript of her autobiography The Long Loneliness.]

dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 867 1980-05-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
